poem:
### The Triumph of Recognition

In the gallery of shadows,   
a woman's brush whispers,  
lost in the masculine roar,  
yet painted on silence,  
her truth takes root,  
blossoming in forgotten strokes—  
an acknowledged genius   
born anew in the sun,  
while old masters nod   
from their cobwebbed frames,  
finally acknowledging their sister.
